page.title: 17HISTORIC BUILDINGS
page.content: {Manor Houses.} There are three manor houses in our block, two in West Hanney and one in East Hanney. {Prior's Court.} Prior's Court is the oldest of the three manor houses and is actually mentioned in the original Domesday book. {Philberd's Manor.} Philberd's Manor is thought to be fourteenth century.At one time it was owned by King Edward and there are signsthat it was once surrounded by a moat. {West Hanney House.} West Hanney House is thought to have been built in the 1490's.A lot of the house is tudor.
